name: react-preloader-icon
description: SVG loading icons component for React.

scripts.build:vendor: browserify -r babel-core/browser -r react -r react-dom -r react-mixin -r velocity-animate -r core-js/fn/object/assign -r core-js/fn/promise -r core-js/fn/symbol -r detectie -o dist/browser.vendor.js
scripts.build:browser: browserify -x react -x react-dom -x react-mixin -x velocity-animate -x core-js/fn/object/assign -x core-js/fn/promise -x core-js/fn/symbol -x detectie -s PreloaderIcon src/index.js -o dist/browser.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-decorators-legacy ] ]
scripts.build:html: mustache -p html/showcase.mustache -p html/icon-form.mustache -p html/codebox.mustache package.json html/index.mustache > dist/index.html
scripts.watch:js: watchify -x react -x react-dom -x react-mixin -x velocity-animate -x core-js/fn/object/assign -x core-js/fn/promise -x core-js/fn/symbol -x detectie -s PreloaderIcon src/index.js -o dist/browser.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties transform-decorators-legacy ] ] -d -v
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && onchange 'html/*' -- npm run build:html
scripts.build: npm run build:vendor && npm run build:browser && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:html
scripts.watch: npm run watch:js | npm run watch:html

author: UYEONG <uyeong21c@gmail.com> (http://blog.coderifleman.com/)
